overview: In the documentary "Al-Hamdoelilah," you were introduced to Hicham. He has been struggling with a rare muscle disease since birth and was told he would not live past 18. But he is still with us, thank God! In 2021, he had the privilege of performing the small pilgrimage (umrah) with his parents. Our camera went along and captured how strong their bond is. Take a look at this special journey full of gratitude.
title: Umrah op rolletjes
